item.title: Black-Scholes-Merton Model
item.description: Code package main import ( "fmt" "math" ) // // Quick demo of the classic black-scholes-merton model for // estimating npv of european options. Model assumes that // the underlying stock does not pay any dividends for the // lifetime of the option. // // For a call, c // c = S*N(d1) - K*e^(-r(T-t))*N(d2) // // For a put, p // p = K*e^(-r(T-t))*N(-d2) - S*N(-d1) // // Where // d1 = (ln(S/K) + (r + σ²/2)(T-t))/ σ√(T-t) // And // d2 = d1 - σ√(T-t) // // const TotalTradingDays = 252.
